text: Rustom may refer to: *Rustom (film) (2016), A Bollywood film starring Akshay Kumar and Ileana D'Cruz *Elie Rustom (born 1987), Lebanese basketball player *Emile Rustom, Lebanese football manager *Paul Rustom (born 1983), Lebanese footballer *Rustom Jal Vakil (born 1911), Indian cardiologist *DRDO Rustom, an unmanned combat air vehicle ==See also== * Rustum (disambiguation)
title: Rustom
